source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot from a worm's-eye view, looking directly up through the center of a multi-story, rectangular staircase. The warm, orange-colored walls contrast with the dark, ornate metal railings, creating a spiraling, geometric pattern that recedes into the distance. The shot includes a slow, rotating camera movement that enhances the vertiginous perspective.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: The camera rolls counterclockwise regularly and smoothly.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The camera consistently and smoothly rotates counterclockwise, enhancing the dynamic and immersive quality of the shot.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The camera consistently and smoothly rotates counterclockwise, enhancing the dynamic and immersive quality of the shot.

The shot features a consistent and smooth counterclockwise rotation, enhancing the dynamic and immersive quality of the vertiginous perspective.

bad_caption: A group of children runs down a wide, sunlit hallway, weaving between large potted plants and pausing occasionally to look out tall windows. As they reach the end of the corridor, they gather around a colorful mural on the wall, pointing and chatting animatedly before continuing their playful dash around a corner.
